snippet: John G. Rowland, who has already spent time in prison for corruption, is now accused of obstructing justice, falsifying documents and committing other violations of campaign finance laws.
abstract: Former Connecticut Gov John G Rowland, who has already spent time in prison for corruption, is now facing another trial; Rowland is accused of obstructing justice, falsifying documents and committing other violations of campaign finance laws in connection with services he provided Lisa Wilson-Foley, Republican candidate for Congress in 2012, and her husband Brian Foley.
lead_paragraph: John G. Rowland, who has already spent time in prison for corruption, is now accused of obstructing justice, falsifying documents and committing other violations of campaign finance laws.

headline.main: Second Trial Approaching for Rowland, Ex-Connecticut Governor
headline.print_headline: Second Trial for Rowland on Charges of Corruption
